triplets: Portable electronic device designed for wireless communication and multimedia functionality
Making phone calls, sending messages, internet browsing, taking photos and videos, gaming, and running mobile applications
Outer casing of metal, plastic, or glass; internal components including battery, circuit boards, camera modules, display screens, and sensors
Display screen, battery, camera, speakers, microphone, buttons, SIM card slot, processor, antenna
Varies: Black, White, Silver, Gold, Blue, Red, and other manufacturer-specific colors
Personal electronics, mobile communication networks, smartphones ecosystem
Approximately 0.7–1 cm thickness; other dimensions vary by model
2–5 years depending on usage, battery life, and software support
